short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension converts Zawgyi text to Unicode encoded.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will convert Zawgyi to Unicode encoded text.

MU² WEB UNICODE CONVERTER is an extension for Myanmar users. It will:
  * Detect Zawgyi encoded text and convert automatically to Unicode encoded text
  * Fix Zawgyi font embedded web site to display Unicode text correctly.

This is a good REPLACEMENT for the extension "MUA Web Unicode Converter" by sannlinng, which is no more compatible with recent Chrome Manifest version.

More extension by Nicolas Micaux: https://chromewebstore.google.com/search/micaux.nicolas

*****************************

This version is compatible with Chrome MANIFEST V3

Source code is under GPL licence.
- Inspired by https://github.com/sanlinnaing/MUA-Web-Unicode-Converter"
- based on Myanmar Font Tagger
- used Parabaik converter script.
